metadata.title: CVE-2024-43884 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: MGMT: Add error handling to pair_device()hci_conn_params_add() never checks for a NULL value and could lead to aNULLpointer dereference causing a crash.Fixed by adding error handling in the function.
